Title: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei Jo: Zoku Zetsubou Shoujo Senshuu
Description: ['A special summary episode of the second season of Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei, focusing on the girls that were not introduced in the first Zetsubou Shoujo Senshuu: Otonashi Meru, Fujiyoshi Harumi, Kaga Ai and Mitama Mayo.']
